name: Satellarknight Betelgeuse
effectText: If this card is Summoned: You can target 1 "tellarknight" card in your Graveyard, except "Satellarknight Betelgeuse"; send this card to the Graveyard, and if you do, add that target to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Satellarknight Betelgeuse" once per turn.
